sqlGroup.name: templateFolder
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT * FROM SSM_STDTMP_FOLDER WHERE R_SOURCE=? AND R_TENANT=? AND P_TENANT=? AND P_PROFESSION=? AND R_TEMPLATE=?

sqlGroup.name: templateFile
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT * FROM SSM_STDTMP_FILE WHERE R_SOURCE=? AND R_SID=? AND R_TENANT=? AND P_TENANT=? AND P_PROFESSION=? AND R_TEMPLATE=?

sqlGroup.name: grade
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT C_CATEGORY,C_PROJECT,C_REQUEST,C_CONTENT,N_SCORE,C_METHOD,C_DESC,N_SCORE_REAL FROM SSM_GRADE_E_D WHERE R_TENANT=? AND R_SID=(select SID from SSM_GRADE_E_M where N_STATE=1 order by T_START desc limit 1 )

sqlGroup.name: hiddenDanger
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT A.`R_TENANT`,A.`S_TENANT`,A.`P_TENANT`,A.`R_TEMPLATE`,A.`P_PROFESSION`, NOW() AS `T_CREATE` FROM `ssm_template` A LEFT JOIN (SELECT *FROM `ssm_stdtmp_file_06` WHERE YEAR(`T_CREATE`) = YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(`T_CREATE`)=MONTH(NOW())) B ON A.`R_TENANT`=B.`R_TENANT` AND A.`R_TEMPLATE`=B.`R_TEMPLATE` AND A.`P_PROFESSION`=B.`P_PROFESSION` WHERE B.`SID` IS NULL
